article.title: TCOM to Provide Aerostats for Persistent Ground Surveillance
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: TCOM Limited Partnership, Columbia, Maryland, is being awarded an approximate $12 million contract modification for the procurement of hardware in support of Phase III of the Persistent Ground Surveillance Systems (PGSS) for the U.S. Army. Hardware to be provided includes three 28M+ aerostat systems and three site spares to outfit and enhance the capabilities of the existing PGSS currently fielded. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
